name: Wireless Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and travelers.

name: Smartphone X
description: Latest flagship smartphone with 6.7-inch OLED display, 5G connectivity, and professional-grade camera system.

name: Laptop Pro
description: Powerful laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and dedicated graphics card. Ideal for professionals and gamers.

name: Smart Watch
description: Advanced smartwatch with health monitoring, GPS, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant and stylish design.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and 12-hour battery life. Perfect for outdoor activities.

name: Gaming Console
description: Next-generation gaming console with 4K graphics, 1TB storage, and extensive game library.

name: Tablet Ultra
description: Lightweight tablet with 10.5-inch display, fast processor, and all-day battery life. Great for work and entertainment.

name: Digital Camera
description: Professional digital camera with 24MP sensor, 4K video recording, and interchangeable lenses.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, touch controls, and compact charging case.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: Central hub for smart home devices with voice control, automation features, and security monitoring.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Slim fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and smartphone notifications.

name: External SSD
description: Fast external SSD with 1TB capacity, USB-C connectivity, and durable aluminum casing.
